languages.text: {n}Голову сжимает раскаленным обручем.{/n} "Разве достойно избранника задавать вопросы, что может достаться ему чужой волей? Ты сам{mf||а} забираешь то, что пожелаешь — потому ты и сорвал{mf||а} с глаз шоры, мешающие тебе видеть истину".

{n}You feel as if a white-hot metal ring has suddenly tightened around your head.{/n} "Is it worthy of the chosen one to ask what others can give {mf|him|her}? You take what you desire, because you have torn the veil from your eyes and now see the truth."
languages.original_text: {n}Голову сжимает раскаленным обручем.{/n} "Разве достойно избранника задавать вопросы, что может достаться ему чужой волей? Ты сам{mf||а} забираешь то, что пожелаешь — потому ты и сорвал{mf||а} с глаз шоры, мешающие тебе видеть истину".

traits.locale_text: {n}Your head is squeezed by an incandescent ring.{/n} "Do you think it is allowable for the chosen one to ask what they can get by others' will? You take what you desire — this is because you have freed your eyes from the curtains that were hiding the truth from you."

{n}Your head is squeezed by an incandescent ring.{/n} "Do you think it is allowable for the chosen one to ask what they can get by others' will? You take what you desire — this is because you have freed your eyes from the curtains that were hiding the truth from you."

{n}Your head is squeezed by an incandescent ring.{/n} "Is it worthy of the chosen one to ask what others can do for them? You may take what you desire, because you have lifted the veils from your eyes and now see the truth."

{n}Your head is squeezed by an incandescent ring.{/n} "Is it worthy of the chosen one to ask what others can do for them? You may take what you desire, because you have lifted the veils from your eyes and now see the truth."

{n}You feel as if a white-hot metal ring has suddenly tightened around your head.{/n} "Is it worthy of the chosen one to ask what others can give {mf|him|her}? You take what you desire, because you have torn the veil from your eyes and now see the truth."

languages.text: {n}你感觉头颅仿佛突然被白炽状态的金属环箍住了一样。{/n}“身为神选者，你需要问别人能为你做些什么吗？你可以得到任何你想要的东西，因为你已经撕开了面纱，看到了真相。”
languages.original_text: {n}You feel as if a white-hot metal ring has suddenly tightened around your head.{/n} "Is it worthy of the chosen one to ask what others can give {mf|him|her}? You take what you desire, because you have torn the veil from your eyes and now see the truth."

traits.locale_text: {n}你感觉头颅仿佛突然被白炽状态的金属环箍住了一样。{/n}“身为神选者，你需要问别人能为你做些什么吗？你可以得到任何你想要的东西，因为你已经撕开了面纱，看到了真相。”

languages.text: {n}Un anneau incandescent étreint votre tête.{/n} « Est-ce digne de l'{mf|élu|élue} que de demander aux autres ce qu'ils peuvent lui apporter ? Vous pourrez prendre ce que vous désirez, car vous avez écarté le voile qui entravait votre vision et ainsi découvert la vérité. »
languages.original_text: {n}Your head is squeezed by an incandescent ring.{/n} "Is it worthy of the chosen one to ask what others can do for them? You may take what you desire, because you have lifted the veils from your eyes and now see the truth."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un anneau incandescent étreint votre tête.{/n} « Est-ce digne de l'{mf|élu|élue} que de demander aux autres ce qu'ils peuvent lui apporter ? Vous pourrez prendre ce que vous désirez, car vous avez écarté le voile qui entravait votre vision et ainsi découvert la vérité. »

languages.text: {n}突然、白熱した金属の輪が頭を締め付ける感覚に襲われた。{/n} 「選ばれし者は、他人が何を与えてくれるかを聞くべきだろうか？あなたは目の前のベールを破り、今、真実を見ている。だから、望むものを手にするだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}You feel as if a white-hot metal ring has suddenly tightened around your head.{/n} "Is it worthy of the chosen one to ask what others can give {mf|him|her}? You take what you desire, because you have torn the veil from your eyes and now see the truth."

traits.locale_text: {n}突然、白熱した金属の輪が頭を締め付ける感覚に襲われた。{/n} 「選ばれし者は、他人が何を与えてくれるかを聞くべきだろうか？あなたは目の前のベールを破り、今、真実を見ている。だから、望むものを手にするだろう」

languages.text: {n}Sientes como si un anillo de metal abrasador te estrujara la cabeza.{/n} «¿Acaso corresponde a{mf|l elegido| la elegida} preguntar lo que otros pueden darle? Toma lo que desees, pues has arrancado el velo de tus ojos y ahora ves la verdad».
languages.original_text: {n}You feel as if a white-hot metal ring has suddenly tightened around your head.{/n} "Is it worthy of the chosen one to ask what others can give {mf|him|her}? You take what you desire, because you have torn the veil from your eyes and now see the truth."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sientes como si un anillo de metal abrasador te estrujara la cabeza.{/n} «¿Acaso corresponde a{mf|l elegido| la elegida} preguntar lo que otros pueden darle? Toma lo que desees, pues has arrancado el velo de tus ojos y ahora ves la verdad».

languages.text: {n}Ein glühender Ring umschließt mit festem Druck deinen Kopf.{/n} "Ist es würdig vom Auserwählten, zu fragen, was andere für ihn tun können? Ihr könnt Euch nehmen, was Ihr begehrt, weil der Schleier von Euren Augen genommen wurde und Ihr nun die Wahrheit seht."
languages.original_text: {n}Your head is squeezed by an incandescent ring.{/n} "Is it worthy of the chosen one to ask what others can do for them? You may take what you desire, because you have lifted the veils from your eyes and now see the truth."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein glühender Ring umschließt mit festem Druck deinen Kopf.{/n} "Ist es würdig vom Auserwählten, zu fragen, was andere für ihn tun können? Ihr könnt Euch nehmen, was Ihr begehrt, weil der Schleier von Euren Augen genommen wurde und Ihr nun die Wahrheit seht."
